title: The Pharmacy at Wellington | Prescriptions | COVID-19
description: Locally-owned full-service pharmacy. 501-708-4320 Open every day. Drive-thru, local delivery. COVID-19 and flu tests. Regular, travel, and COVID-19 vaccines.
cleaned_text: For the latest, call us and listen to the message that plays before you make a selection. Labor Day, Mon. Sept. 4 -- closed Hablamos español. Pedir hablar con Constanza. Need guidance on which vaccines your child needs? We also administer back-to-school vaccines. Or... would you like an RSV vaccine? Click on the link below to find out more.
